metadata.name: Space Trader #1/20
metadata.description: "Space Trade" is a work of art depicting the exciting experience of a NFT collector in his spaceship. The artwork captures the passion and adventure of searching for unique and valuable pieces in the vast universe of NFTs. The futuristic environment of the spaceship accentuates the idea that art and technology are intrinsically connected and that innovation and creativity are constantly evolving. Overall, the work invites the viewer to explore the infinite possibilities of the world of NFT.
